# How to Automate Secure SDK Delivery for iOS & Android Apps

Last updated April 27, 2023 by Appdome

Appdome is a no-code mobile app security platform designed to add security features, like 3rd party SDKs. This KB shows mobile developers, DevSec and security professionals how to use Appdome’s simple ‘click to build’ user interface to quickly and easily add services in their apps. This Knowledge Base article details the easy steps to automate secure SDK delivery for iOS & Android apps. Use this as your guide for securing mobile apps. All with No Code, Zero Dev, No SDK.

## How Does Appdome Make Automated Secure SDK Delivery for iOS & Android Apps Easy?

### What is a Mobile SDK?

A mobile service SDK (software development kit) is a set of software development tools that are designed to make it easier for mobile developers to integrate mobile services into their applications at the source code level. To learn more about Mobile SDKs, refer to this knowledge base article: [“Using Appdome to Integrate Mobile SDKs to any Mobile App.”](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-app-security/no-code-mobile-app-security/using-appdome-to-integrate-mobile-sdks/)

### Appdome Automates the Entire Mobile Integration Lifecycle

Appdome uses technology to accelerate mobile app and mobility initiatives. Mobile app integration projects that typically take months to complete can be finished in minutes. Appdome brings scale to mobile app projects by automating the entire mobile integration lifecycle. With Appdome, organizations can apply consistent implementations across all apps, adding and maintaining critical services inside apps, build-by-build.

### Making Adding Mobile SDKs to the Appdome Platform Easy

Appdome’s no-code mobile app security platform offers mobile developers, DevSec and security professionals a convenient and reliable way automate secure SDK delivery for iOS & Android apps. When a user clicks “Build My App,” Appdome leverages a microservice architecture filled with 1000s of security plugins, and an adaptive code generation engine that matches the correct required plugins to the development environment, frameworks, and methods in each app.

## Any Service, Any App

The Appdome platform is a fully automated, modular, mobile app integration service to automate secure SDK delivery for iOS & Android. Appdome enables mobile developers and mobility professionals (IT, Ops, Security, etc.) to integrate any service (SDK or API) into any Android and iOS mobile app in seconds. Fusion, as a technology, is compatible with (a) all Android and iOS mobile apps, including native, hybrid and non-native apps, (b) all vendors, SDKs, APIs standards, methods and frameworks and (c) multi-service, multi-vendor implementations.

Once added the platform, we group the SDKs and APIs into the following service categories; Mobile Security, Access, Identity, Management, Mobile Thread, Analytics and Collaboration. We are continuously adding new services categories, SDKs and APIs to the platform.

If you are a mobile service or solution vendor or have a mobile SDK or API which you would like to make available for automated 1-click integration using Appdome, drop us a line at [sales@appdome.com](mailto:sales@appdome.com?subject=Please%20Add%20a%20Mobile%20SDK%20to%20the%20Platform!) and tell us about your SDK or use case. We would be pleased to evaluate it and get back to you within a few days.
